sourceDesc.p: M.R. James, Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Corpus Christi College, Cambridge 1912

projectDesc.p: The James Catalogue was digitized then marked up following the TEI P5 Guidelines. The customized model was provided by Giuliano Di Bacco, stored in an ODD file (parkerweb.xml): the latter was written by GDB using ROMA vers. 2.x, with manual adaptations. The ODD file is used as a source to compile the actual schema used to validate the xml: it is advisable to compile it in RelaxNG sintax (parkerweb.rnc) through ROMA.

msDesc.head: Baldwin of Ford OCist, De sacramento altaris. Miscellaneous Tracts and Sermons on the Eucharist
Tractatus de Eucharistia, etc.
msDesc.p: Vellum (and paper), 221 150 8.7 x 6, ff. 1 + 319, 36-34 lines to a page. Cent. xv in several hands, clear enough but ugly.

msItem.head: Baldwin of Ford OCist, De sacramento altaris

head.title: Baldwinus de sacramento altaris

msItem.rubric: Tractatus magistri baldewini archiepiscopi cantuariensis de sacramento altaris
msItem.incipit: Amantissimo domino et patri B. dei gratia exoniensi episcopo
msItem.explicit: reuereri quod imperas. Vale
msItem.incipit: Magnum et profundum noui verique misterium sacrificii
msItem.explicit: habundancie suauitatis eius eructabunt
msItem.rubric: Explicit baldewinus de sacramento altaris

msItem.head: Gaufridus monachus (attrib.), Compendium de corpore Christi

head.title: Gaufredi compendium de corpore Christi et sacramento eucharistiae

msItem.rubric: Incipit compendium gaufridi de corpore christi uel sacramento eukaristie
msItem.incipit: Gaufridus peccator in presenti tractatu catholicus scriptor
msItem.explicit: ffactus conscendit iudex uenturus in orbem
msItem.rubric: Explicit compendium etc.

head.title: De laude Dei

msItem.rubric: Quomodo pura mente debeas dominum nostrum Ihesum Christum iugiter laudare
msItem.incipit: Ad laudis tue memoriam solam domine deus meus cor meum liquescit
msItem.explicit: inicium eterne laudis patrie celestis. Amen

head.title: Epistola Deoduini Leodiensis ad Henricum Francorum regem

msItem.explicit: uel propter alios ut timeo ad penam (?). Vincencius in speculum historiale libro 26 capitulo xxxo

msItem.explicit: et forma rerum earundem permanente

msItem.incipit: Septem ecclesie sacramenta 7em remedia sunt
msItem.explicit: et tandem conferatur exitus beatus. Amen

msItem.head: Isidore of Seville, Allegoriae sacrae scripturae

head.title: Tractatus de vita et morte sanctorum utriusque testamenti

ab.quote: Ex verbis, quae in fronte hujus tractatus occurrunt, perperam intellectis, Orosio attribuitur et in indice hujus codicis et a Cl. Stanley:- verba autem haec sunt, Orosio Ysodori salutes: multum sane hallucinatus est scriba, ea tamen sic esse legenda, Orosio Isidorus salutem, satis liquet, et proinde opus non Orosio sed Isidoro esse attribuendum

msItem.rubric: Orosio ysidori salutes
msItem.incipit: Quedam notissima nomina legis
msItem.explicit: corrigenda iudicio
msItem.incipit: Adam figuram christi gestauit
msItem.explicit: eterne beatitudinis refectione saturabuntur

msItem.head: Jerome, Epistula ad uirgines

head.title: Hieronimus ad virgines de continentia virginali

msItem.rubric: Incipit Jeronimus ad virgines de continentia virginali
msItem.incipit: Quantam in celestibus beatitudinem
msItem.explicit: et ipse sit dignus

head.title: Idem ad Celanam quo juste et caste vivat

msItem.rubric: Jeronimus ad celanam quomodo iuste et caste uiuat
msItem.incipit: Decus scripture sentencia celebrata est
msItem.explicit: ipse reprobetur a domino
msItem.rubric: Explicit epistola

msItem.head: Giles of Rome OESA, Theoremata de corpore Christi

head.title: Egidius [Romanus] de sacramento altaris

msItem.rubric: Item tractatus de sacramento altaris
msItem.incipit: Quia inter cetera sacramenta ecclesie
msItem.explicit: cohortem angelicam ad quam ordinat tui corporis et sanguinis sacramenturn qui cum patre et spiritu sancto es verus deus et benedictus in secula seculorum. Amen
msItem.rubric: Explicit tractatus de corpore Christi editus a fratre Egidio romano fratrum heremitarum ordinis Sancti Augustini. Deo gratias

msItem.head: John Tissington OFM, Confessio de sacramento altaris

head.title: Iohannes Tassyngton de sacramento altaris

ab.quote: Ad finem, Explicit confessio magistri et fratris Iohannis Tassyngton de ordine minorum, et sacrae theologiae doctoris, quam edidit, et in scholis fratrum minorum Oxoniis determinando promulgavit ad declarationem et defensionem fidei ortodoxae de sacramento altaris, quae per sectam Berangariorum, prout superius recitavit, et jam omni clero Oxon. catholico innotuit, periculose extiterat, non auctoritate sed loquacitate, non argumentis vel racionibus sed promptuosis assertionibus blasphemiae impugnata, anno Domini millesimo CCC octogesimo primo.

msItem.incipit: Semel confessus est filius. Confiteor inquit tibi pater domine celi et terre
msItem.explicit: ita in patria pleno ore facie ad faciem perfruamur. Amen

head.title: De pena et culpis
De penis et culpis

msItem.incipit: Pena et culpa curiositatis prima transgressionis occasia ortum habuisse
msItem.ab: Pena illorum qui malediccionem dei incurrunt
msItem.explicit: per malachiam ait malediccio super benediccionibus vestris. Malachie 2

remarks: item 19, Celantiam (N.B. 'ti' not in MS)
